snippet: The effects of Tropical Storm Irene have not toppled Schoharie, N.Y., where a makeshift cafe has helped sustain community spirit.
abstract: Schoharie, NY, has not toppled under the effects of Tropical Storm Irene and many attribute town's resilience to a makeshift cafe that popped up days after the storm to feed villagers and emergency workers; week after week, month after month, it has served free hot lunches to residents, volunteers, reconstruction workers and anyone else in search of a simple meal and some company.
lead_paragraph: The effects of Tropical Storm Irene have not toppled Schoharie, N.Y., where a makeshift cafe has helped sustain community spirit.

headline.seo: Makeshift Cafe Sustains Storm-Ravaged Schoharie, N.Y.
headline.main: Storm-Ravaged Village Builds a Bond at the Lunch Table
headline.print_headline: Storm-Ravaged Village Builds a Bond at Lunch Table
